name: Real Quad Bike Mania
description:
Get ready to play racing quad bike impossible track game in which you will have to race ATV bike and make grand stunts on impossible tracks. The grand stunt tracks are made with mega ramps in the air. To be the master of quad bike riding you have to perform new tricky bike stunts of 2018. ATV simulation on impossible tracks is risky driving because the off road tracks are narrow and full of challenging obstacles

Features:
• Appealing interface
• Hd and 3d graphics
• Amazing visual and sound effects
• Realistic quad atv bike simulator
• Challenging levels with varying degree of difficulty.
• An exceptionally adventurous and action packed quad bike racing game.
